Introduction
The goal of this package is to provide a unit test framework for GAP and GAP packages. As such, it is not meant to replace the existing test functionality in GAP, but rather to complement it.
This package is still in early development. Feedback on its design and functionality, as well as pull requests and patches, are highly welcome. The latest version can always be found at
https://github.com/fingolfin/UnitTests/
